      • list

        public java.util.List<FabricService> list(int index,
                                 int max)
        Lists all Services

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/services?index={index}&max={max}

        Parameters:
        index - index where to start in the list of items
        max - maximum number of items to return, or -1 if all
        Returns:
        the list of services

      • getNodes

        Returns:

      • getNodes

        public java.util.List<FabricNode> getNodes(java.net.URI id,
                                  int index,
                                  int max)
        Get information on which nodes the service is deployed on

        API Call: GET /vdc/fabric/services{id}/nodes?index={index}&max={max}

        Parameters:
        id - The Service
        index - index where to start in the list of nodes
        max - maximum number of nodes to return, or -1 if all
        Returns:
        Information on which nodes the service is deployed on
